name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Selfish of a Rough Stone【#星街すいせい４周年LIVE 】 [RDHf9Tmdvpk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei speaks to the audience after her 4th anniversary live performance, reflecting on the many announcements made and teasing one final surprise.
A cinematic teaser video announcing a new music project titled 'Midnight Grand Orchestra,' a collaboration between Hoshimachi Suisei and TAKU INOUE.

subtitles.original: あの、あれだね。告知がすごく盛りだくさんでしたね。
subtitles.english: Um, there were so many announcements, weren't there?

subtitles.original: え、なんと最後にもう一つあります。
subtitles.english: And, there's one more thing at the very end.

subtitles.original: な、なにかしら？なにかしら？まだあるの？
subtitles.english: W-what could it be? What could it be? Is there still more?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、えー、この動画を流して、今日のライブは終わりといたします。
subtitles.english: So, um, I'll end today's live by playing this video.

subtitles.original: 星街すいせい & TAKU INOUE New Music Project 『Midnight Grand Orchestra』
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei & TAKU INOUE New Music Project "Midnight Grand Orchestra"
